Morning Valore fam!

Going forward, Rollin Bones with Ryan Howard will no longer be a part of Valore Studio's Twitch programing.

We want to thank Ryan for having his content on our Twitch channel for the last few months. It's been a lot of fun and we met some really cool people.

@ThatCandaceGirl @CheyenneWright @TAYvanbiljon @realKaiRoche @GregoryFesto @meghancaves @PEG_Games Right now we are running a Rebroadcasting of Episodes 1 - 3 if anyone wants to stop in and catch up.
